title: Romeo Beckham has date with new model 'girlfriend' Mia 'Mimi' Moocher
text:
They sparked romance rumours earlier this year when she joined him at a private family dinner in celebration of his mother Victoria Beckham's fashion show.

And Romeo Beckham enjoyed another day out with rumoured new girlfriend Mia 'Mimi' Moocher as the pair visited one of London's Tate galleries on Sunday.

The 17-year-old son of David and Victoria Beckham appeared on Mia's Instagram stories as he put on a casually cool display in a dove grey hoodie, silver chain and cross body bag.

Just friends? Romeo Beckham enjoyed another day out with rumoured new girlfriend Mia 'Mimi' Moocher as the pair visited one of London's Tate galleries on Sunday

Last month: They sparked romance rumours earlier this year when she joined him at a private family dinner in celebration of his mother Victoria Beckham's fashion show

The teen sported blonde curtains as he stood in a smoke filled room in the clip.

Romeo also posted snaps of his day of cultural fun, but did not share any photos of Mia.

One showed him in the same smoky room, while he also posed up with rays of coloured light on his face.

Last month Romeo and Mia were pictured arriving together for Victoria's dinner at Harry's Bar in Mayfair.

Outing: The 17-year-old son of David and Victoria Beckham appeared on Mia's Instagram stories as he put on a casually cool display in a dove grey hoodie, silver chain and cross body bag

Romeo was pictured wearing a light blue shirt and striped trousers with box fresh white trainers after sitting in the FROW with the rest of his famous family.

And Mimi shared a video of the catwalk from inside the show on her Instagram stories soon after attending.

She also shared a picture of Romeo on her Instagram on his birthday on September 1, writing: 'Haps smiley bday Romo' alongside a heart emoji.

Several of her pals commented, writing things like: 'you guys are the cutest!!' and 'u2 are so [heart].'

Mimi is followed by both Cruz, 14, and Romeo and it's not known how long they have known one another.
description: Romeo Beckham enjoyed another day out with rumoured new girlfriend Mia 'Mimi' Moocher as the pair visited one of London's Tate galleries on Sunday.
